modShortDescription: These 7 Days to Die bigger backpack mods adds more slots to your backpack. 187 Slot, 375 Slot and 630 Slot.
modDescription:
These 7 Days to Die bigger backpack mods adds [more slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) to your backpack.

## 187 Slot Bigger Backpack Mod

* Adds 187 slots to your backpack.
* Cleaned xmls up.
* Combine Modlet compatible.

## 375 Slot Bigger Backpack Mod

* Adds a 375 slot backpack.
* Adds in the Quick sort and stash buttons.
* May need editing depending on your screen size etc.

## 630 Slot Bigger Backpack Mod

* Adds 630 slots (21 x 30) to your backpack.
* The combine tool.
* Expanded Crafting queue (20 x 11).
* UI Rearranged (forge and output windows on left of screen).
* Windows Output Bigger (12 x 7).
* Adds in the backpack stash buttons.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/stallionsdensz%20187%20Slot%20backpack)** 187 Slot Bigger Backpack Mod  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/stallionsdensz%20375%20backpack)** 375 Slot Bigger Backpack Mod  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/stallionsdensz%20630%20backpack)** 630 Slot Bigger Backpack Mod
